name: scrolls2.0-backend
description: A RESTful api service for Scrolls 2.0

scripts.build: npm run test && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --minify --platform=node --outfile=dist/index.min.js && cp -r src/pages dist | true && cp -r fonts dist | true && cp .env dist | true
scripts.cleanBuild: rm -rf coverage && rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install && npm run build

author: Rob Doneux
